K12D0496_H0466:149b-15: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mar rnam par rgyu ba dang /
K12D0496_H0466:149b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:149b-17: byang chub kyi yan lag gi gzungs thob pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:149b-18: nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang /
K12D0496_H0466:149b-20: 'chi ba rnam par spangs pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:149b-21: sems can thams cad kyi don byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:149b-22: smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par lus de nyid
K12D0496_H0466:149b-23: kyis byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar
K12D0496_H0466:149b-25: rig sngags 'chang gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
K12D0496_H0466:149b-26: dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje mtshan ma can /
K12D0496_H0466:149b-27: lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis phyag byas ba'am /
K12D0496_H0466:149b-29: sna tshogs gzugs can gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba /
K12D0496_H0466:150a-0: rig sngags 'chang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i @150a *//
K12D0496_H0466:150a-1: g-yog 'khor dang ldan par yid las byung ba'i khang pa chen po na gnas pa /
K12D0496_H0466:150a-2: de mthong bas rig sngags 'chang rnams mi dbul po dang 'dra bar sems shing /
K12D0496_H0466:150a-3: bdag cag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:150a-4: ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur te /
K12D0496_H0466:150a-5: nyin gcig bzhin du rjes su dran par byed na
K12D0496_H0466:150a-6: mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang
K12D0496_H0466:150a-8: nyin gcig bzhin du nyi ma 'char kar phyag rgya bcings te /
K12D0496_H0466:150a-9: lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na zla ba drug na yul gru sbyin par byed do //
K12D0496_H0466:150a-10: shing ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dag la sngags lan re re btab ste /
K12D0496_H0466:150a-11: nyi ma'i gzugs la bsnun na zla ba gcig na grong dam pa brgyad sbyin par byed do //
K12D0496_H0466:150a-13: padma dag la lan bdun sngags kyis btab nas bcom
K12D0496_H0466:150a-14: ldan 'das dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje la phul
K12D0496_H0466:150a-15: la snying po mchog de nyid kyis 'bras kyi 'o
K12D0496_H0466:150a-16: thug gis lan 'bum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid
K12D0496_H0466:150a-18: gdong la sngags kyis btab nas gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:150a-19: khros pa la phyag rgya bcings te snying po dran par byas na dang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:150a-20: chu klung chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba mthong na bong ba la sngags kyis btab ste /
K12D0496_H0466:150a-21: 'phangs na chu la rgyu ba thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:150b-0: gos kyi mtha' mar mdud pa por te bgos @150b na kha bcings pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:150b-2: chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa yod par yang de ltar
K12D0496_H0466:150b-3: mdud pa bor na rengs pa byas par 'gyur ro
K12D0496_H0466:150b-4: // gdug pas zin pa la mgo'am mgul bar bkod na dug med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:150b-5: snying po dam pa thig le dang bcas par rkang
K12D0496_H0466:150b-6: mthil yan chad du bsams na dug med par 'gyur
K12D0496_H0466:150b-7: ro // mkha' 'gro mas rgyas btab pa la rang
K12D0496_H0466:150b-8: gi snying gar bsams la nad pa'i mgo la rang
K12D0496_H0466:150b-9: gi gzugs su bsams na de'i mod la sos par
K12D0496_H0466:150b-10: ro // 'gyur ro // gdon thams cad dang /
K12D0496_H0466:150b-11: 'byung po thams cad la yang de bzhin du phyag rgya bcings la /
K12D0496_H0466:150b-13: yungs kar la sngags lan bdun btab ste /
K12D0496_H0466:150b-14: mgo bor bsnun na thams cad 'bros so //
K12D0496_H0466:150b-15: rlung chen po ldang ba mthong na chu la sngags kyis btab ste /
K12D0496_H0466:150b-16: gtor na de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:150b-17: lce 'bab pa mthong na lag pa g-yon pa'i mdzub
K12D0496_H0466:150b-18: mo la sngags kyis btab ste bsdigs na zlog par
K12D0496_H0466:150b-20: ci ste 'chi byed la phur pus gdab par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phur bu'am /
K12D0496_H0466:150b-21: lcags kyi phur bu la rab tu drag po'i snying
K12D0496_H0466:150b-22: po dam pas lan brgyad brgyas sngags kyis btab la
K12D0496_H0466:150b-23: dogs gnyis ka nas sa blangs te; gzugs sor brgyad
K12D0496_H0466:150b-24: pa'i tshad du byas la mi ro bzhag pa'i khri
K12D0496_H0466:150b-27: nyid lag rnams bcings la snying gar phur bu des btab par 'gyur te /
K12D0496_H0466:151a-2: dgrol na phur bu phyung la mar dang /
K12D0496_H0466:151a-3: sbrang rtsis bkang na phur bu phyung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:151a-4: r'a dz'a nam ba shi ka rtug mo la pan
K12D0496_H0466:151a-5: ma yim bra kri trir kritva ra h'a sa ba
K12D0496_H0466:151a-6: bi gata parpa ta a'a kre ba ta kshi na
K12D0496_H0466:151a-7: tsa ra nad aa bar bhya:/
K12D0496_H0466:151a-8: ya th'a bi bo th'a p'u dza /
K12D0496_H0466:151a-9: kri tv'a tshad tva dz'u h'u yad tris bad ha
K12D0496_H0466:151a-10: r'a dza sa pa ri b'a ro ba sham aa
K12D0496_H0466:151a-11: gatstsha ti / skal ba bzang po bya bar 'dod
K12D0496_H0466:151a-12: na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du
K12D0496_H0466:151a-13: nyin gcig bzhin lan tshva'i sreg blugs sbyin sreg byas
K12D0496_H0466:151a-15: rkang bzhi pa thams cad kyi nang na skal ba mchog tu bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:151a-16: kha zas kyi sbyin sreg byas na kha zas 'byung ngo //
K12D0496_H0466:151a-17: dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje la blta zhing zas
K12D0496_H0466:151a-18: mi bza' bar bzlas brjod 'bum byas na gang 'dod
K12D0496_H0466:151a-19: pa de'i dam pa sbyin par byed do //
K12D0496_H0466:151a-20: shing n+ya gro dha'i drung du dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste bsrung ba byas la /
K12D0496_H0466:151a-21: aa ga ru'i bdug pa bsreg cing zas mi bza' bar gnod sbyin mo yid la byas te /
K12D0496_H0466:151a-22: lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K12D0496_H0466:151a-23: gang bslangs ba de sbyin par byed do //
K12D0496_H0466:151a-24: nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa byas shing nor bu bzang gi lag nas bzung ste //
K12D0496_H0466:151a-25: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na /
K12D0496_H0466:151a-26: zla ba drug gis ti na ra brgya sbyin par byed do //
K12D0496_H0466:151b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi @151b zhabs kyi mthe bong la bzung la /
K12D0496_H0466:151b-1: nyi ma shar ka nas nub kyi bar du mig phye ste bzlas brjod byas na /
K12D0496_H0466:151b-2: thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sngon gyi las rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:151b-3: dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje la blta zhing mig
K12D0496_H0466:151b-4: mi 'dzums par bzlas brjod byas na tshe ring bar
K12D0496_H0466:151b-5: 'gyur ro // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0496_H0466:151b-6: la blta zhing nyin re bzhin dus gsum du dran
K12D0496_H0466:151b-7: par byed na dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:151b-8: lag na rdo rje'i lag na yod pa'i rdo rje
K12D0496_H0466:151b-9: la 'jus te kha zas mi bzang bar lan sum
K12D0496_H0466:151b-10: 'bum bzlas brjod byas na rang gi gnas su khrid
K12D0496_H0466:151b-11: par 'gyur ro // rdo rje'i rigs gzhon nu'i lus thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:151b-12: de bzhin kun tu bzang po dang //
K12D0496_H0466:151b-13: byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
K12D0496_H0466:151b-14: la bltas te zas mi bza' bar lan sum 'bum
K12D0496_H0466:151b-15: bzlas brjod byas na rang rang gi gnas su khrid
K12D0496_H0466:151b-16: par 'gyur ro // char mi 'bab na star bu'i
K12D0496_H0466:151b-17: yam sreg shing 'o ma la smyugs pa brgyad stong
K12D0496_H0466:151b-18: sbyin sreg byas na char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:151b-19: bdag gi dbugs bkag la chu'i nang du lan brgya
K12D0496_H0466:151b-20: rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zla ba drug gis
K12D0496_H0466:151b-22: nyi ma 'gyur ba'i tshe lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na //
K12D0496_H0466:151b-23: blon po chen po'i thabs sam /
K12D0496_H0466:152a-0: lag na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs la slong mo'i zas za zhing ma mo'i khyim du ci @152a *//
K12D0496_H0466:152a-2: lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na ma mo thams
K12D0496_H0466:152a-3: cad 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de byed
K12D0496_H0466:152a-4: do // gu gul gyi bdug pas gdon thams cad sel to //
K12D0496_H0466:152a-5: 'bru mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab pas lto ba na ba sel lo //
K12D0496_H0466:152a-6: rab tu 'khrub la srad bu sngon po la sngags
K12D0496_H0466:152a-7: kyis btab ste rked par bcings na rab tu 'khru
K12D0496_H0466:152a-9: klad pa na ba la bil ba'i 'bras bu btags te /
K12D0496_H0466:152a-10: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags la bskus na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:152a-11: mig na ba la dro ba'i me tog gi khu
K12D0496_H0466:152a-12: ba la lan gcig sngags te snar blugs na sos
K12D0496_H0466:152a-13: par 'gyur ro // tsandan gyi lde gu la lan
K12D0496_H0466:152a-14: brgya rtsa brgyad sngags pas tsha ba'i rims sel to
K12D0496_H0466:152a-15: par 'gyur ro // // aa ga ru'i bdug pa'am /
K12D0496_H0466:152a-16: gu gul gyi bdug pas zhag bzhi pa sel to //
K12D0496_H0466:152a-17: ban dhu ka'i shing gis 'bras kyi 'o thug bcos te skyes bu'am /
K12D0496_H0466:152a-18: bud med bu med pa'i rang bzhin can la blud
K12D0496_H0466:152a-19: na skyes pa dang ma 'dus kyang bu 'byung ngo
K12D0496_H0466:152a-20: // kha dog sna bzhi ba'i gtor ma byas la
K12D0496_H0466:152a-21: kha dog sna bzhi pa'i bum pa bzhi la sngags
K12D0496_H0466:152a-22: lan brgya rtsa brgyad btab te lam gyi bzhi mdo'am
K12D0496_H0466:152a-23: // / shing sdong gcig pa'i drung du ma ning ngam /
K12D0496_H0466:152a-24: mo gsham bkrus na bu 'byung ngo //
K12D0496_H0466:152a-25: ci ste dmag gzhom par 'dod na skra can ma dang /
K12D0496_H0466:152b-0: snying po @152b mchog bsregs te lan stod rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la /
K12D0496_H0466:152b-1: dbyug pa'i phyag rgya bcings te mdzub mos bsdigs na rengs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:152b-2: ci ste phyir zlog par byed par 'dod na byams
K12D0496_H0466:152b-3: pa'i sems kyis dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje phyag
K12D0496_H0466:152b-4: rgya mgo bor bcings la bsams na dgra la phyir
K12D0496_H0466:152b-6: ci ste dgra phung bar bya bar 'dod na bsgrub pa byas te /
K12D0496_H0466:152b-7: nam phyed na skra bshig cing rkang pa g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan te /
K12D0496_H0466:152b-9: de logs su bltas te; dug dang /
K12D0496_H0466:152b-12: ske tshe'i 'bru bsres pa'i sreg blugs rdo rje chen
K12D0496_H0466:152b-13: po'i rtse mo ldeg pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
K12D0496_H0466:152b-14: bil ba'i shing gi me bus pa'i nang du sbyin
K12D0496_H0466:152b-15: sreg byas na phung bar 'gyur te 'di la the
K12D0496_H0466:152b-16: tshom med do // lha 'am yang na klu yang rung //
K12D0496_H0466:152b-17: mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa'ang rung //
K12D0496_H0466:152b-18: gnod sbyin dbang po'am brgya byin yang //
K12D0496_H0466:152b-21: mdor na cho ga gang dang /
K12D0496_H0466:152b-22: gang gis bsgrubs pa'i cho ga de dang /
K12D0496_H0466:152b-23: de nyid kyis dngos grub sbyin par byed do //
K12D0496_H0466:152b-25: kho bos bskal ba nyi shu rtsa gcig gi par
K12D0496_H0466:152b-26: du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
K12D0496_H0466:153a-0: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs @153a *//
K12D0496_H0466:153a-1: rgyas me tog cher rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po mnyes par byas nas /
K12D0496_H0466:153a-3: des kho bor shin tu dka' bar byed par gzigs
K12D0496_H0466:153a-4: pas cher thugs rje'i stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas
K12D0496_H0466:153a-5: snying po dam pa 'di byin no //
K12D0496_H0466:153a-7: snying po dam pa 'di thob ma thag tu kho
K12D0496_H0466:153a-8: bos sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed
K12D0496_H0466:153a-10: gzungs chen po 'bum phrag bcu dang /
K12D0496_H0466:153a-11: mngon par shes pa chen po 'bum phrag bye ba phrag bcu thob bo //
K12D0496_H0466:153a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi
K12D0496_H0466:153a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dag mngon du snang bar gshegs
K12D0496_H0466:153a-14: pa de dag gis kho bo la dus gsum las
K12D0496_H0466:153a-15: yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
K12D0496_H0466:153a-17: kho bos chos kyi rnam grangs //
K12D0496_H0466:153a-19: snying po mchog de nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi
K12D0496_H0466:153a-20: stobs kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam la bzung
K12D0496_H0466:153a-24: gang gi tshe snying po dam pa 'di thob pa'i skad cig de la /
K12D0496_H0466:153a-26: sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa
K12D0496_H0466:153a-27: gzungs kyi sgo 'bum phrag grangs med pa thob bo
K12D0496_H0466:153b-0: khyod kyis rnam grangs @153b 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:153b-1: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dag na
K12D0496_H0466:153b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
K12D0496_H0466:153b-3: la gnas te / gsang sngags yang dag par ston pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:153b-5: gzungs kyi sgo rnams grub cing rga ba dang /
K12D0496_H0466:153b-7: 'chi ba las grol ba de dag thams cad kyang
K12D0496_H0466:153b-8: snying po dam pa 'di nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs
K12D0496_H0466:153b-9: nas thams cad kha dog sna tshogs su gyur te
K12D0496_H0466:153b-10: / gzhon nu'i gzugs 'dzin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho
K12D0496_H0466:153b-11: 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byed do; ;zhi ba'i blo
K12D0496_H0466:153b-12: / gros / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0496_H0466:153b-13: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
K12D0496_H0466:153b-14: me tog cher rgyas rgyal po'i dbang po 'di yang
K12D0496_H0466:153b-17: ri mo'i gzugs med par bdag nyid grub pa'o //
K12D0496_H0466:153b-18: ci ste ri mo'i gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na tshes grangs dang /
K12D0496_H0466:153b-20: yud tsam bzang por gtogs pa la rin la mi
K12D0496_H0466:153b-21: rtseg par rgyu skud nyos la rdo rje drag po
K12D0496_H0466:153b-22: chen po'i snying pos bsrung ba'i cho ga byas pas
K12D0496_H0466:153b-23: ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la /
K12D0496_H0466:153b-24: me tog bkram par tha ga pa yan lag yongs su tshang ba /
K12D0496_H0466:154a-2: rtag tu chos la dga' ba zhag thags cha ba'i
K12D0496_H0466:154a-3: rnam lngas bskus pa dag gis skra ma shor bar
K12D0496_H0466:154a-4: khru lnga ma 'am; drug pa zhig 'thag tu gzhug
K12D0496_H0466:154a-5: go / khrus byas shing byug pas byugs la thod
K12D0496_H0466:154a-6: ze'u ka bcings shing dri zhim po'i dri dang ldan
K12D0496_H0466:154a-7: par byas pas mchod pa cher byas la; aa ga
K12D0496_H0466:154a-8: ru'i bdug ba bsregs shing tha ga pa la yon
K12D0496_H0466:154a-9: bzang po byin la dgrol bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:154a-10: bkrol nas kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
K12D0496_H0466:154a-11: sa phyogs gtsang ma me tog sil ma bkram par spos dang /
K12D0496_H0466:154a-12: bdug pas bdugs la spos kyi chu'i nang du bcug ste zhag bdun gzhag go /
K12D0496_H0466:154a-13: de nas phyung la nyi ma la skam mo //
K12D0496_H0466:154a-15: gur gum bsres pa'i phye ma 'jam pos ras la lan mang du bsgo bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:154a-18: skya snar la sogs pa'i me tog gis kyang bsgo bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:154a-19: smyung ba byas pas chos grangs ngan pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:154a-20: mi mthun par 'jug pa'i nyes ba dang bral zhing tshes grangs dang /
K12D0496_H0466:154a-22: yud tsam bzang po la rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs mang por 'byin pa /
K12D0496_H0466:154b-0: shis pa brjod pa yod pa'i me @154b tog bkram
K12D0496_H0466:154b-1: pa'i dkyil 'khor du mchod pa rgya cher byas la
K12D0496_H0466:154b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas
K12D0496_H0466:154b-4: snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa /
K12D0496_H0466:154b-5: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa /
K12D0496_H0466:154b-11: kha zas ran bar za ba /
K12D0496_H0466:154b-12: bsrung ba byas ba zhig tshon rtsi sar pa spyin dang ma bsres pa'i tshon rnams kyis /
K12D0496_H0466:154b-13: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K12D0496_H0466:154b-14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog cher
K12D0496_H0466:154b-15: rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po 'drir gzhug ste /
K12D0496_H0466:154b-16: padma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
K12D0496_H0466:154b-18: mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa /
K12D0496_H0466:154b-19: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa /
K12D0496_H0466:154b-20: kha dog du ma'i 'od zer rnams kyi kun nas yongs su bskor ba /
K12D0496_H0466:154b-21: gtsug tor nas 'od zer chen po 'byung ba /

K12D0496_H0466:237a-4: smras so // 'jam dpal khyod kyis tshig smras pa ni shin tu gtsigs te khyod yang legs so //
K12D0496_H0466:237a-6: khyod 'di lta bu'i gzungs sngags chen po'i gsang sngags
K12D0496_H0466:237a-7: kyi gzhi rnams yid la byed pa ni shin tu
K12D0496_H0466:237a-10: yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag ye
K12D0496_H0466:237a-11: shes chen po 'di lta bu dag yid la byed
K12D0496_H0466:237a-14: glegs bam du byas nas nyin gcig bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba de dag ni /
K12D0496_H0466:237a-15: shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste /
K12D0496_H0466:237a-16: de ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:237a-17: de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas
K12D0496_H0466:237a-18: na yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K12D0496_H0466:237a-19: bcu'i phra rab kye rdul snyed sbyin pa mthong bar
K12D0496_H0466:237a-20: 'gyur te / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:237a-21: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub
K12D0496_H0466:237a-22: sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
K12D0496_H0466:237a-23: smras so // gang gi tshe 'di nyid la byang
K12D0496_H0466:237a-24: chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi tshul 'di rtogs nas
K12D0496_H0466:237a-25: thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyi go 'phang thob par
K12D0496_H0466:237b-0: bya ba'i phyir @237b mngon par brtson par byed pa
K12D0496_H0466:237b-1: dag go 'phang de thob par gyur pa ye shes
K12D0496_H0466:237b-2: chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor
K12D0496_H0466:237b-3: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sngon ma byung ba
K12D0496_H0466:237b-4: de sems can chen po shod cig de skad ces
K12D0496_H0466:237b-5: smras so // smras pa dang / byang chub sems
K12D0496_H0466:237b-6: dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
K12D0496_H0466:237b-7: pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12D0496_H0466:237b-9: gang du zhugs pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga po dag yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0496_H0466:237b-10: don thams cad kyang 'byor par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0496_H0466:237b-11: dpal thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0496_H0466:237b-12: sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0496_H0466:237b-13: ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi
K12D0496_H0466:237b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dgod pa de nyon cig
K12D0496_H0466:237b-18: de la lus can thams cad la gsang chen dang bcas pa /
K12D0496_H0466:237b-19: slob dpon rnams kyi gsang chen mchog gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba /
K12D0496_H0466:237b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag
K12D0496_H0466:237b-21: gi ming du gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o
K12D0496_H0466:237b-23: de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad la //
K12D0496_H0466:237b-24: tshad ni khru brgyad tham pa ste //
K12D0496_H0466:237b-25: slob dpon nyid kyi khru yis bya //
K12D0496_H0466:237b-27: cha ni rnam pa gsum du bya //
K12D0496_H0466:237b-28: blo dang ldan pas cha gsum du //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-1: bya ste; ;der ni sgo yang bzhi gtod do //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-2: gru bzhi lham pa kha khyer bcas //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-3: sngon gyi bzhir du cha gsum la //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-4: cha ni rnam pa brgyad bya /
K12D0496_H0466:238a-5: mkhas pas cha brgyad nas su //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-6: dbus kyi char ni 'jug par bya //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-7: chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-8: thang cig thang cig bsam byas la //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-9: phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-10: dkyil 'khor rgyal po bri bar bya //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-11: sngags pas de yi dbus su ni //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-12: padma mchog tu mdzes pa bri //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-14: 'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa yin //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-15: de yi steng du bum pa ste //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-16: bum pa'i steng du autpal lo //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-17: autpal steng du dung bri ste //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-18: me lce phreng ba 'khrigs pas mdzes //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-19: shes rab pha rol phyin de ni //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-20: ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan; ;cha brgyad gang dag brjod pa yang //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-21: dbus kyi cha las byung ba ste //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-22: gzungs kyi tshul du bri ba yang //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-23: cho ga'i rim bzhin mthun par bya //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-24: de la shar phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo /
K12D0496_H0466:238a-25: dbang po chen po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
K12D0496_H0466:238a-26: autpa la'i phyag rgyar bri bar bya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:238a-27: mtha' rnams su autpa la bkra zhing me lce 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:238a-28: bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te /
K12D0496_H0466:238a-29: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0496_H0466:238b-1: sarba th'a r'a aom bha ga ba ti /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-2: sarba ta th'a ga te dza ni ke /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-3: su r'a ya pra ti dzny'a na /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-6: a'a ha ra a'a ha ra /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-7: h'um h'um dza hi dza hi sv'ah'a /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-8: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo
K12D0496_H0466:238b-9: rje mi pham pa me lce zhes bya ba'i gzungs
K12D0496_H0466:238b-11: chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-12: padma shin tu mdzes pa bri //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-13: de yi steng du 'khor lo ste //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-14: me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa mdzes //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-15: de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-16: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0496_H0466:238b-22: dam ma ni da ma ma ni /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-23: gargha ri gargha ri hr'i: sv'ah'a /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-24: me'i phyogs su brten nas bcom ldan 'das ma sdig
K12D0496_H0466:238b-25: pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri
K12D0496_H0466:238b-26: bar bya ste / chu dang dbang chen ldan pa yi //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-27: phyag rgya gzugs bzang bri bar bya //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-28: padma'i steng du rdo rje ste //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-29: me lce'i nang du shin tu mdzes //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-30: de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-31: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0496_H0466:238b-33: sarba th'a tra ta tra ta /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-35: sarba p'a pam sho dha ne sv'ah'a /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-36: lho phyogs su ni gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:238b-37: me dang rlung dang ldan pa yis //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-39: de yi steng du rin po che //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-40: bsam pa thams cad yongs skong ba //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-41: me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs zhi ba //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-42: padma rnams kyi yongs su bskor //
K12D0496_H0466:238b-43: de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te /
K12D0496_H0466:239a-2: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a /
K12D0496_H0466:239a-6: sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na nir dz'a te sv'ah'a /
K12D0496_H0466:239a-7: bden bral phyogs su ni bdud thams cad rnam par
K12D0496_H0466:239a-8: 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste
K12D0496_H0466:239a-9: / de yi me yi dkyil 'khor te //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-10: padma'i dbus su gnas pa yin //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-11: de yi steng du sngags pa yis //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-12: lcags kyu shin tu mdzes pa bris //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-13: phan tshun 'brel pa'i rdo rje dag /
K12D0496_H0466:239a-14: blo dang ldan pas der dgod do //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-15: de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te /
K12D0496_H0466:239a-16: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0496_H0466:239a-25: byang gi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha'
K12D0496_H0466:239a-26: yas pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar
K12D0496_H0466:239a-27: bya ste / de yi dkyil 'khor bri ba ni //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-29: de yi steng du padma ste //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-30: 'od ni dus mtha'i me lta bu //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-31: de yi steng du ral gri ste; ;'od zer rnams kyis yongs su bskor //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-32: me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs ldan pa'i //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-33: autpal rnams kyis kun khebs bya //
K12D0496_H0466:239a-34: de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te /
K12D0496_H0466:239a-35: na ma: sarba ta tha ga te bhya:/
K12D0496_H0466:239a-40: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
K12D0496_H0466:239b-0: rlung gi phyogs su ni dkon mchog 'byung @239b gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:239b-1: de yi rlung gi dkyil 'khor te //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-2: cha gsum la ni gtsug tor gnas //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-3: lcags kyus thams cad dgab par bya //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-4: me lce 'bar ba'i phreng bar ldan //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-5: nub phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma skul byed ma bri bar bya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:239b-6: de la dbang chen dkyil 'khor te //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-7: de la rdo rje legs par gnas //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-8: de yi steng du padma che //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-9: padma'i steng du bgrang nor phreng //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-10: de dag me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-11: steng du padma rnams kyis dgab //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-12: de nas cha gsum pa la ni //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-14: sngags pas ci rigs bri bar bya //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-15: brgyad rnams su yang snga ma bzhin //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-16: de la shar du rnal 'byor pas //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-18: padma shin tu mdzes pa ni //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-19: de yi phyag rgyar brjod pa yin //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-20: me'i phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po
K12D0496_H0466:239b-21: kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor
K12D0496_H0466:239b-23: dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyag rgya autpal bri bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-24: lho phyogs su ni lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdo rje dri bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-25: byang phyogs su ni byams pa'i phyag rgya ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-26: rlung gi phyogs su ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya padma bri bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:239b-27: bden bral gyi phyogs su ni nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya ral gri bri bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:240a-1: su ni sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya padma bri bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:240a-2: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub
K12D0496_H0466:240a-3: sems dpal lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
K12D0496_H0466:240a-4: smras so // lag na rdo rje /
K12D0496_H0466:240a-8: khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:240a-9: bde ba'i phyir ye shes chen po dbang bskur ba'i
K12D0496_H0466:240a-10: gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor brjod pa khyod yang
K12D0496_H0466:240a-11: legs so // de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:240a-12: lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12D0496_H0466:240a-14: ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
K12D0496_H0466:240a-15: po 'di su'i lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs
K12D0496_H0466:240a-19: gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam /
K12D0496_H0466:240a-22: 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste /
K12D0496_H0466:240a-23: de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur; chom rkun gyis 'joms par mi 'gyur /
K12D0496_H0466:240a-24: srin po la sogs pas gtses par mi 'gyur /
K12D0496_H0466:240a-25: de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /
K12D0496_H0466:240a-26: rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12D0496_H0466:240a-27: sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur /
K12D0496_H0466:240a-28: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge
K12D0496_H0466:240a-29: ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig
K12D0496_H0466:240b-1: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-2: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su zin par 'gyur /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-3: shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-4: gang 'dzin pa dang; klog pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-6: ming tsam yang 'dzin pa lta ci smos te /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-7: de'i sgrib pa thams cad 'byang par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:240b-8: des ngan song gi sgo thams cad gcad par 'gyur ro; ;des ngan song dang /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-9: ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsring bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:240b-10: gang zhig nang par langs nas su //
K12D0496_H0466:240b-11: lan gcig klog par byed pa'i mi //
K12D0496_H0466:240b-12: srin pa nyam ngar gang byas pa'i //
K12D0496_H0466:240b-13: sdig las grol bar de 'gyur ro ////
K12D0496_H0466:240b-14: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-15: bam po bcu gnyis pa ste tham /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-17: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12D0496_H0466:240b-19: sus dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di bris nas der
K12D0496_H0466:240b-20: zhugs par gyur na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po
K12D0496_H0466:240b-22: lag na rdo rjes smras pa /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-24: kho bos ni de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad bstan par mi nus mod kyi /
K12D0496_H0466:240b-28: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po
K12D0496_H0466:240b-29: ni sa'i rdul ji snyed yod pa de de snyed
K12D0496_H0466:241a-1: dpal; ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can sdig can
K12D0496_H0466:241a-2: gang tshul 'di la yid mi ches pa dag yod
K12D0496_H0466:241a-5: rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin can dang /
K12D0496_H0466:241a-6: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rab tu zin pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:241a-8: ma la ma gus pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:241a-10: bla ma la smod pa dang; bla ma'i skyon 'bru
K12D0496_H0466:241a-11: ba'i sems can de dag la ni ye shes chen
K12D0496_H0466:241a-12: por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di
K12D0496_H0466:241a-13: lag tu yang 'chang du mi gzhug go /
K12D0496_H0466:241a-14: rna lam du yang grag par mi bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:241a-16: de dag gi mdun du ni gtam yang mi bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:241a-17: glegs bam du bris pa yang de dag gi mdun du dbye bar yang mi bya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:241a-18: sems can sdig pa can de dag gis spong ba cung zad byas pas kyang /
K12D0496_H0466:241a-19: ngan song sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo //
K12D0496_H0466:241a-21: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no //
K12D0496_H0466:241a-22: zhes zer te de dag ni bdag kyang phung la /
K12D0496_H0466:241a-23: gzhan dag kyang phung bar byed do //
K12D0496_H0466:241a-24: de ltar byed pa'i sems can de dag la ni
K12D0496_H0466:241a-25: gsang sngags gyi dngos grub med do zhes kho bos
K12D0496_H0466:241a-27: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te /
K12D0496_H0466:241b-0: de dag rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur na nges par 'byin @241b pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:241b-1: gsang sngags kyi dngos grub gtan med do //
K12D0496_H0466:241b-2: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:241b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0496_H0466:241b-4: lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so
K12D0496_H0466:241b-5: // gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad pa gang
K12D0496_H0466:241b-6: yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0496_H0466:241b-7: de dag ni shin tu bka' ba byed pa yin
K12D0496_H0466:241b-9: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
K12D0496_H0466:241b-10: de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges pa yin te /
K12D0496_H0466:241b-11: de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:241b-12: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub
K12D0496_H0466:241b-13: sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
K12D0496_H0466:241b-14: smras so // byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang
K12D0496_H0466:241b-15: ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen
K12D0496_H0466:241b-16: po'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yi ger 'dri ba
K12D0496_H0466:241b-17: smras so // dang / klog pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:241b-18: 'jin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam yod par rig par bya /
K12D0496_H0466:241b-19: lag na rdo rjes smras pa /
K12D0496_H0466:241b-21: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
K12D0496_H0466:241b-22: ji snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod
K12D0496_H0466:241b-23: nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de'i bsod nams
K12D0496_H0466:241b-24: kyi phung po yang de tsam du rig par bya'o
K12D0496_H0466:241b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzungs sngags 'di'i rang bzhin du bzhugs te /
K12D0496_H0466:241b-27: tshul 'di ma rtogs pa blun po de dag gis ni mi shes so //
K12D0496_H0466:242a-2: byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:242a-3: sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa ji snyed pa rnams rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12D0496_H0466:242a-4: cho 'phrul sna tshogs byed pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:242a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
K12D0496_H0466:242a-6: 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs ston
K12D0496_H0466:242a-7: pa de dag thams cad kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag
K12D0496_H0466:242a-9: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang bdud pham par byed pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:242a-10: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:242a-11: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no //
K12D0496_H0466:242a-13: su gsang ba'i ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i
K12D0496_H0466:242a-14: dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dam tshig
K12D0496_H0466:242a-15: thams cad la zhugs pa yin no //
K12D0496_H0466:242a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de lta bu'i rang bzhin nam /
K12D0496_H0466:242a-18: gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin nam /
K12D0496_H0466:242a-19: dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir te /
K12D0496_H0466:242a-20: de bas na gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ma gtogs pa de las gzhan med do //
K12D0496_H0466:242a-22: dkyil 'khor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
K12D0496_H0466:242a-23: su 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba yin no //
K12D0496_H0466:242b-0: phyogs gang du @242b ye shes chen por dbang bskur
K12D0496_H0466:242b-1: ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa 'am
K12D0496_H0466:242b-4: gang zhig nyin gcig tu nang par langs nas lan
K12D0496_H0466:242b-5: re klog pa de la 'jigs pa rnams mi 'byung
K12D0496_H0466:242b-6: ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de la nyin gcig bzhin du gzigs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:242b-7: 'chi khar yang de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston par mdzad do //
K12D0496_H0466:242b-10: sa la gnas pa'i shing dang /
K12D0496_H0466:242b-11: nags tshal thams cad ni sa med na de dag kyang med do //
K12D0496_H0466:242b-13: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0496_H0466:242b-14: byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems la dbang thob pa rnams kyang /
K12D0496_H0466:242b-15: gzungs sngags 'di dag la gnas te /
K12D0496_H0466:242b-16: 'di dag gi byin gyis brlabs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang rnyed do //
K12D0496_H0466:242b-17: bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed do //
K12D0496_H0466:242b-19: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'o //
K12D0496_H0466:242b-20: de nas sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byad de /
K12D0496_H0466:242b-21: 'di ltar thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no //
K12D0496_H0466:242b-23: de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang chongs shig /
K12D0496_H0466:242b-26: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston cig
K12D0496_H0466:242b-27: dang de sems can thams cad la phan pa dang
K12D0496_H0466:243a-2: sa phyogs gang na ye shes chen por dbang bskur
K12D0496_H0466:243a-3: ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa'i
K12D0496_H0466:243a-4: sa phyogs de mchod rten lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:243a-5: gang gi lag na 'chang ba'i sngags pa de la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:243a-7: sngags pa de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtag tu byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:243a-8: sngags pa des kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor
K12D0496_H0466:243a-9: 'di rin po che za ma tog bzhin du rtag
K12D0496_H0466:243a-13: sems can gang sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0496_H0466:243a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams lam gus pa'i rang bzhin can dang /
K12D0496_H0466:243a-15: slob dpon gyi skyon 'dru ba dag yod pa'i phyir te; 'jam dpal /
K12D0496_H0466:243a-16: de dag la ni chung ngu na gtam du yang bzlas par mi bya /
K12D0496_H0466:243a-17: glegs bam yang bstan par mi bya na dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang /
K12D0496_H0466:243a-18: klog tu gzhug pa dang bltar gzhug pa lta ci smos /
K12D0496_H0466:243a-20: 'di lta bu dag bltar gzhug pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:243a-21: tshig tu dbyung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'khrul pa yin te /
K12D0496_H0466:243a-23: byang chub sems dpa'i bag med pa chen por rig par bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:243a-24: de ni 'khrul pa chen po dang /
K12D0496_H0466:243a-25: shin tu kha na ma tho ba chen po yin no //
K12D0496_H0466:243b-0: byang chub @243b sems dpa' chen po la bslu ba ni sla yi /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-1: gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag spong ba de ni de lta ma yin no //
K12D0496_H0466:243b-3: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon te /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-5: au du ma wa ra'i me tog bzhin no //
K12D0496_H0466:243b-6: de bas kyang gzungs sngags 'di 'dra ba dag ston pa ni dkon no //
K12D0496_H0466:243b-7: de bas kyang nan tan gyis sgrub pa ni dkon no //
K12D0496_H0466:243b-8: de bas kyang 'di gang gi lag na 'chang ba dang; gang dag 'di nyan pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-11: yang na dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon te /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-12: sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-13: gang dag nang par langs nas lan gcig klog pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-14: de'i mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:243b-15: de la 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:243b-16: dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad dang /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-17: phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:243b-18: de'i lus la nad thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:243b-19: gang la las dben pa'i phyogs su ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs la /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-20: me tog phul nas tshes grangs dang /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-23: dus bzang po la gro ga la bris sam /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-24: yang na yar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam /
K12D0496_H0466:243b-25: ches bco lnga la spos dang /
K12D0496_H0466:244a-1: lha bshos phul la mar gyi mar me brgyad dang /
K12D0496_H0466:244a-2: gser gyi bum pa lnga bzhag nas gro ga la bris te mgul pa'am /
K12D0496_H0466:244a-5: rked par btags la 'thab mo 'gyed pa'i nang du 'gro ba'am /
K12D0496_H0466:244a-7: rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na /
K12D0496_H0466:244a-8: de la 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:244a-10: 'di ni sems can rnams bsrung ba'i mchog yin te /
K12D0496_H0466:244a-13: gnas khang gang na gzungs sngags 'di dag 'dug pa'i gnas der bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:244a-15: gang gis gzungs sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung
K12D0496_H0466:244a-16: bas bsrung bar byas pa la 'gal bar byed ba
K12D0496_H0466:244a-17: ni lha dang bcas pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:244a-18: bdud dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ste /
K12D0496_H0466:244a-19: de'i mgo bo lag na rdo rje ngas kun tu
K12D0496_H0466:244a-20: 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pas 'gems so
K12D0496_H0466:244a-22: char mi 'bab na yang gzungs sngags 'di bklag par bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:244a-23: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong na yang bklag par bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:244a-24: mi nad kyi gnod pa 'byung ba la yang bklags
K12D0496_H0466:244a-25: na 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
K12D0496_H0466:244a-26: te / de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:244a-27: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub
K12D0496_H0466:244b-0: sems dpa' @244b lag na rdo rje la 'di skad
K12D0496_H0466:244b-1: ces smras so // byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
K12D0496_H0466:244b-2: gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rgya che ba 'di dang /
K12D0496_H0466:244b-5: gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba /
K12D0496_H0466:244b-6: sems can sdig can rnams la bstan du mi rung
K12D0496_H0466:244b-7: ba 'di ni lag na rdo rje khyod kyis shin
K12D0496_H0466:244b-8: tu dkon pa zhig smras te /
K12D0496_H0466:244b-9: 'di ni sngon ma thos na 'di sems can ji lta bu dag la bshad par bya /
K12D0496_H0466:244b-10: lag na rdo rjes smras pa /
K12D0496_H0466:244b-12: gang dag byang chub kyi sems sgom pa la zhugs pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:244b-13: gang gi tshe de dag gi byang chub kyi sems grub par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K12D0496_H0466:244b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo
K12D0496_H0466:244b-16: spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ye shes
K12D0496_H0466:244b-17: chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor
K12D0496_H0466:244b-19: gang dag gis byang chub kyi sems rdzogs par ma
K12D0496_H0466:244b-20: gyur pa de dag ni gzhug par mi bya ste
K12D0496_H0466:244b-21: / de dag gis dkyil 'khor yang ltar mi gzhug go /
K12D0496_H0466:244b-22: de dag la ni phyag rgya dang /
K12D0496_H0466:244b-23: gsang sngags kyang bstan par mi bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:244b-25: gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di byin gyis brlab
K12D0496_H0466:244b-26: par bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po bcings pa
K12D0496_H0466:244b-27: tsam gyis thams cad byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba
K12D0496_H0466:245a-1: g-yas pa'i gung mo bkug pa ni gzungs sngags thams cad 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:245a-3: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0496_H0466:245a-5: sarba th'a a'a gatstsha pu nitt'i /
K12D0496_H0466:245a-8: mam ga li mam ga li h'um phat/
K12D0496_H0466:245a-9: de nyid kyi gung mo snga ma bzhin du bzhag na /
K12D0496_H0466:245a-10: dkyil 'khor du gzungs sngags rnams kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:245a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya ni lag
K12D0496_H0466:245a-12: pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis bkug
K12D0496_H0466:245a-13: na thams cad drangs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:245a-15: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0496_H0466:245a-17: sarba ta th'a ga ta bo dhi satva ma dha ri /
K12D0496_H0466:245a-22: de nas mchod pa mchog 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:245a-23: lag pa gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkyed pa ni mchod pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:245a-24: 'dis mchod pa'i cho ga byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:245a-26: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0496_H0466:245a-31: pra barta ya pra brta ya /
K12D0496_H0466:245a-32: sarba ta th'a ga ta sam ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0496_H0466:245a-34: de nas slob dpon gyis cho ga snga ma bzhin du slob ma yongs su gzung bar bya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:245b-0: byang chub kyi sems sgom pa 'grub pa la dkyil 'khor @245b 'di dang /
K12D0496_H0466:245b-2: de ma yin pa gzhan pa la ni glegs bam yang bltar gzhug par mi bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:245b-4: gal te byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags
K12D0496_H0466:245b-5: kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig
K12D0496_H0466:245b-6: mi shes pa'i sems can la dkyil 'khor bstan tam
K12D0496_H0466:245b-7: / phyag rgya bstan na des sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0496_H0466:245b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bslus par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:245b-9: mtshams med pa lnga yang byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:245b-11: byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni sla yi /
K12D0496_H0466:245b-12: dam tshig mi shes pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:245b-13: lus yongs su ma sbyangs pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:245b-14: byang chub kyi sems sgom pa ma grub pa la ston pa ni de lta ma yin te /
K12D0496_H0466:245b-16: sems can de dag gi mdun du ni nam kyang tshig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:245b-18: sems can sdig can de dag ni sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0496_H0466:245b-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la drin du mi gzo ba dang /
K12D0496_H0466:245b-20: dad pa pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K12D0496_H0466:245b-21: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sems can de la ya mtshan du 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K12D0496_H0466:245b-22: sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam nas cang mi zer bar gyur to //
K12D0496_H0466:245b-23: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub
K12D0496_H0466:245b-24: sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
K12D0496_H0466:246a-0: smras so // byang chub sems dpa' @246a *//
K12D0496_H0466:246a-2: gzungs sngags 'di dag nyan pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:246a-6: chung ngu ni rna lam du grag pa tsam du
K12D0496_H0466:246a-7: gyur pa de yang shin tu dkon pa yin no
K12D0496_H0466:246a-8: // lag na rdo rjes smras pa /
K12D0496_H0466:246a-11: ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
K12D0496_H0466:246a-13: gang dag gzungs sngags 'di dag la mchod pa byed pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:246a-14: yi ger 'dri ba'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon par rig par bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:246a-16: gzhan la bris nas yan lag dang /
K12D0496_H0466:246a-17: nyid lag gang yang rung ba la 'chang na de la 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung zhing /
K12D0496_H0466:246a-18: sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te /
K12D0496_H0466:246a-19: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyin gcig bzhin du sangs rgyas stong las bsags par 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:246a-21: phyogs gang na gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa 'di gnas pa 'am /
K12D0496_H0466:246a-22: gang gi lag na yod pa'i sa phyogs de ni mchod rten lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:246a-23: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub
K12D0496_H0466:246a-24: sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
K12D0496_H0466:246a-25: smras so // byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
K12D0496_H0466:246a-28: kha ton byed pa gang yin pa de la ni kho bos mchod pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:246b-0: de'i phyi bzhin @246b du yang rtag tu 'brang bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:246b-1: gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe
K12D0496_H0466:246b-2: na yang kho bos de'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen byas
K12D0496_H0466:246b-3: te / rtag tu byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston par bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:246b-7: tshig 'di ni legs par smras so //
K12D0496_H0466:246b-9: kho bos kyang de la mchod pa bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:246b-10: rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin du yang 'brang bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:246b-11: rtag tu bsrung bar yang bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:246b-12: 'chi ba'i tshe na yang de la lung bstan par bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:246b-13: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub
K12D0496_H0466:246b-14: sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
K12D0496_H0466:246b-15: smras so // byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
K12D0496_H0466:246b-16: gang bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang
K12D0496_H0466:246b-17: sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
K12D0496_H0466:246b-18: dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su
K12D0496_H0466:246b-20: gzungs sngags gang bsgrubs na sngags pas tshe 'di nyid
K12D0496_H0466:246b-21: la yid la ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par
K12D0496_H0466:246b-22: 'gyur pa'i gzungs sngags 'di dag gi dngos grub sgrub
K12D0496_H0466:246b-23: pa'i rim par phye ba rgyas par shod cig /
K12D0496_H0466:246b-24: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:246b-25: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal
K12D0496_H0466:246b-26: gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so
K12D0496_H0466:246b-28: gzungs sngags 'di dag gi sgrub pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji skad gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig /
K12D0496_H0466:247a-2: smyung ba yang bya mi dgos /
K12D0496_H0466:247a-4: gzungs sngags bsgrub pa'i tshe yang rtag tu sangs rgyas
K12D0496_H0466:247a-5: rdzu 'phrul chen po thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs
K12D0496_H0466:247a-7: thog mar re zhig gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ri
K12D0496_H0466:247a-8: mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'byung ste; kha thabs
K12D0496_H0466:247a-9: bzhin du ras nyos la skra la sogs pa med
K12D0496_H0466:247a-10: par bya'o // de nas ba las byung ba'i sna lngas bkrus la spos chus bkru'o //
K12D0496_H0466:247a-13: yud tsam bzang po la ri mo bris te /
K12D0496_H0466:247a-14: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pa 'drir gzhug go /
K12D0496_H0466:247a-15: ri mo mkhan de yang 'khor los bsgyur bas bsrung bar bya'o; ;nyin gcig bzhin du lha bshos dang /
K12D0496_H0466:247a-16: mchod pa yang dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:247a-17: de nas ri mo mkhan gyis dbus su bcom ldan
K12D0496_H0466:247a-18: 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
K12D0496_H0466:247a-20: skyil mo krung du 'dug la thor tshugs can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par bya'o //
K12D0496_H0466:247a-21: bcom ldan 'das ma'i g-yon rol du so sor 'brang ba chen mo bri bar bya ste /
K12D0496_H0466:247a-22: autpa la'i rgyal po chen po la 'dug cing /

K12D0496_H0466:257b-3: brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin mo thams
K12D0496_H0466:257b-4: cad sngags pa de la nyin gcig bzhin du snod
K12D0496_H0466:257b-6: rma bya'i sgra brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na bdud kyi gdon thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0496_H0466:257b-7: aa ga ru sa marda nan aasta ha sa sran
K12D0496_H0466:257b-8: dzu hu y'ad r'a dza ba sho bha ba ti
K12D0496_H0466:257b-9: / pri yang ku'i yam sreg shing gis ni /
K12D0496_H0466:257b-10: ma h'a r'a dza gra ma hi shi ba sho bha ba ti /
K12D0496_H0466:257b-11: aa ga ru'i yam sreg shing gi me bus la
K12D0496_H0466:257b-12: til 'bru khri sbyin sreg byas na yul dbang du
K12D0496_H0466:257b-13: 'gyur ro // shing 'o ma can gyi me bus
K12D0496_H0466:257b-14: la til 'bru 'bum sbyin sreg byas na sha za
K12D0496_H0466:257b-15: thams cad dbang du 'gyur te ci 'dod pa byed
K12D0496_H0466:257b-16: 'gyur ro // do // shing ma da kas me
K12D0496_H0466:257b-17: bus la na le sham gyi 'bru brgyad stong sbyin
K12D0496_H0466:257b-18: sreg byas na 'byung po thams cad dbang du 'gyur
K12D0496_H0466:257b-19: te 'byung po'i bdag po re re la yang nyin
K12D0496_H0466:257b-20: gcig bzhin du g-yog brgya'i gos zas sbyin par byed
K12D0496_H0466:257b-21: 'gyur ro // do // do // gar 'gro 'dod pa der phrag pa la bskyen te 'gro'o //
K12D0496_H0466:257b-22: mon sran gre'u 'bru 'bum sbyin sreg byas na 'byung mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur te /
K12D0496_H0466:257b-23: de dag sngags pa de'i yo byad thams cad sgrub bo //
K12D0496_H0466:257b-25: 'di dag la sogs pa gzungs 'di rnams kyi bsgrub
K12D0496_H0466:257b-26: pa dag ni gang du sbyor ba de'i dngos grub
K12D0496_H0466:258a-1: dang; sbyor ba tha dad pa dang /
K12D0496_H0466:258a-3: nyung yang rung bas kyang sgrub par byed do //
K12D0496_H0466:258a-7: sgrub pa rnams la ni bgegs rnams kyi skabs med do //
K12D0496_H0466:258a-8: lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las /
K12D0496_H0466:258a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12D0496_H0466:258a-10: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so ////
K12D0496_H0466:258a-11: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang /
